https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anchorP._instruction: Enter the coordinates of the anchor point for this annotation (e.g., its centroid in two dimensional space as [x, y] or in three dimensional space as [x, y, z]).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anchorP.label: Anchor point
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/anchorP.name: anchorPoint

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin._instruction: Add the coordinate space for this custom annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.description: Two or three dimensional geometric setting.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.label: Coordinate space
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/coordin.name: coordinateSpace

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri._instruction: Add the protocol execution defining the criteria that were applied to produce this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.description: Aspects or standards on which a judgement or decision is based.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.label: Criteria
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.name: criteria

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri._instruction: Add the quality type of the stated criteria used to define this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.description: Distinct class that defines how the judgement or decision was made for a particular criteria.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.label: Criteria quality type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.name: criteriaQualityType

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri._instruction: Add the criteria type for this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.label: Criteria type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/criteri.name: criteriaType

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inspire._instruction: Add all (source) files that inspired the definition of this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inspire.label: Inspired by
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/inspire.name: inspiredBy

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna._instruction: Enter the identifier (or label) of this annotation that is used within the corresponding data files to identify this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.description: Term or code that identifies someone or something within a particular product.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.label: Internal identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/interna.name: internalIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral._instruction: Add one or both sides of the body, bilateral organ or bilateral organ part that this annotation is defined in.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral.description: Differentiation between a pair of lateral homologous parts of the body.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral.label: Laterality
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lateral.name: laterality

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/preferr._instruction: Add the preferred viewer specification to visualize this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/preferr.label: Preferred visualization
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/preferr.name: preferredVisualization

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi._instruction: Add the non-parametric or parametric specification of this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi.description: Detailed and precise presentation of, or proposal for something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi.label: Specification
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specifi.name: specification

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type._instruction: Add the geometry type of this annotation.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.description: Distinct class to which a group of entities or concepts with similar characteristics or attributes belong to.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.label: Type
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/type.name: type
